descriptions.install-chocolatey.ps1: Installs Chocolatey package manager with proper configuration and health checks.
descriptions.install-essential-apps.ps1: Installs essential Windows applications including browsers, development tools, and utilities.
descriptions.auto-update-chocolatey.ps1: Automatically updates Chocolatey and packages when connected to specific WiFi and on power.
descriptions.cleanup-chocolatey.ps1: Performs comprehensive cleanup of old package versions, cache, and orphaned dependencies.
